table.name: its4you_installer_user
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_installer_user` ( `userid` int(11), `username` varchar(200), `password` varchar(200), `createdon` datetime ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_installer_license
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_installer_license` ( `license` varchar(250), `license_data` text, PRIMARY KEY (`license`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM

table.name: its4you_installer_alert
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_installer_alert` ( `alert` int(11), `message` varchar(250), `alert_type` varchar(50), `link` varchar(250), `createdtime` datetime, `status` int(1) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_installer_version
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_installer_version` ( `versionid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `extension` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `version` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL, `update_datetime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`versionid`), UNIQUE KEY `extension` (`extension`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM

table.name: its4you_installer_license_user
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_installer_license_user` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `license` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB
